mapper.select: select from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL ORDER by MODEL_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL

select * from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ORDER_NUM = (select max(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ORDER_NUM<(select MODEL_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ORDER_NUM = (select min(MODEL_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ORDER_NUM>(select MODEL_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_FLOW_MODEL where MODEL_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
